we are seeking a CO-OP DATA ANALYST

WE BUILD SOLUTIONS THAT HELP SAVE LIVES

Zetron, a Codan company, is a trusted provider of communication products and solutions that help our customers protect, inform, and save lives. Whether they are conducting a search and rescue, containing a fire, maintaining safety, or providing security at a profile event, Zetron makes sure the customer can be heard over the mountain, throughout the city, or across the globe. We invite you to join our mission at our Canadian Head Office located near beautiful downtown Victoria in the newly restored Press Building with modern office space built for collaboration!

ABOUT THE ROLE:

This is a minimum 4-month co-op based in Victoria, BC, with the strong likelihood for extension to 8 months.

At Zetron, we hire co-op students not only because we want to invest in you, but also because it is an investment in our business. Did you know that 40% of our Engineering staff are UVic alumni?

We are recruiting for a Data Analyst (Co-op) to help us improve tools for managing and reporting on the delivery of critical communication solutions to our customers, as well as the work of our product development teams.

As a member of Zetron, you will work as part of a team. You will have the opportunity to work with colleagues across the business, from Project Management, Systems Delivery, Finance, Engineering, IT, Sales and more. Your work will support teams located around the world in our Canadian, US, UK and Australian offices. Throughout the course of your co-op term, you will:

Learn elements of Zetron's project management, systems delivery, and product development processes.
Work with members of Zetron's global team to synthesize existing processes and artifacts into data models.
Build tools for data entry, data aggregation, and automated model-driven reporting.
Develop documentation and training materials to ensure the tools you build can be maintained in the future.

ABOUT YOU:

We are looking for an ambitious individual, excited to engage with people and learn new things. You will:

Have a strong knowledge of automation, data modelling and reporting in an Office 365 environment.
Have experience building data modelling and presentation solutions with Power Query, Power BI or similar tools.
Use strong written and verbal communication and collaboration skills.
Love to help others derive insights from complex data sets.
Have proven organizational, time management and prioritizing skills.
Be eager to learn, grow, and be challenged.
Get bonus points for having a working knowledge of Project Management, Business Administration, or Accounting.

Please apply with a resume, cover letter, and transcript by e-mailing Jennifer.Beasley@zetron.com, and make sure not to include links, plain text is fine, to any websites when sending in your application. Only successful applicants will be contacted for interviews. Thank you!
